question:
Identify each of the following species as either a Lewis acid or a Lewis base, and write an equation illustrating a Lewis acid-base reaction for each one. Use curved arrows to depict electron-pair movement. Be sure that the product of each reaction is depicted by a complete, correct Lewis structure.
(a) $CN^-$    (b) $CH_3OH$    (c) $(CH_3)_2CH^+$    (d) $MgBr_2$    (e) $ CH_3BH_2$     (f) $CH_3S^-$
